plot: The lives of soul (Araceli González) and Leo (Pablo Echarri) did not seem destined to cross. She, a pastry from the mouth, with her family and her boyfriend Mario from adolescence. He, an architect with safe marriage date with Valeria. One night, fate brought together them and this unexpected encounter will not pass unnoticed. Both Alma and Leo may not be indifferently to what happens between them.
title: Alma mía
